node.doctext:
This is the submission page for the [Fled Noder Quest]. Please be sure you have read the [Fled Noder Quest|rules of the quest] before submitting.

[% my $str; $str .= '
Enter the name of the fled noder you would like to track down:
'; $str .= $query->textfield(-name => "user", -default => "", -size => 35, -maxlength => 255); $str .= $query->submit("submit", "Submit"); $str .= $query->end_form; my $username = $query->param('user'); if (length($username) > 0) { my $questUser = getNode($username, "user"); $str .= "

Verifying User... "; if ($$questUser{node_id} > 0) { $str .= "$username is a user
Verifying Last Seen Date... $$questUser{lasttime}
Qualifies for [Fled Noder Quest]? "; if ($$questUser{lasttime} le "2007-04-22") { $str .= 'Yes!'; # having the fromgroup_id set allow me to make sure that the user isn't sending # me a fake quest submission my $in10seId = getId(getNode('in10se', 'user')); htmlcode('sendPrivateMessage',{ 'author_id' => $$USER{node_id}, 'recipient_id' => $in10seId, 'message' => '['.$$USER{username}.'] has submitted ['.$username.'] (last seen '.$$questUser{lasttime}.') for the [Fled Noder Quest]', 'fromgroup_id' => $in10seId }); $str .= ' (your submission has been received)'; } else { $str .= 'No! (last seen date is too recent)'; } } else { $str .= '"'.encodeHTML($username).'" is not a noder
Qualifies for [Fled Noder Quest]? No! (not a noder)'; } $str .= '

'; } return $str; %]
node.title: Fled Noder Quest Submission
